name: Inureyes.github.io
body:
### Jeongkyu Shin
Ph.D.

Nonlinear and Complex Systems Lab. (NCSL)
Department of Physics, POSTECH
Likes thinking, traveling and reading.

Studying 'opinion formation dynamics of agents' and 'dynamics of superimposed complex systems'. 'Brain' and 'Social' systems.

Cares 'side-effects of global warming' and 'providing public-opinion tools for the democracy on World Wide Web.'
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
